p: In this study, the EO of R. graveolens dried fruits and H. officinalis subsp. aristatus aboveground fresh biomass were sequentially extracted and characterized by GS-MS. The EO oil of both species was eluted asymmetrically during the distillation process, resulting in EO fractions with different weights. This is the first report on R. graveolens and H. officinalis subsp. aristatus EO fractions eluted and collected in different timeframes subsequent to a grinding of the biomass to considerably accelerate the extraction process. Our results confirmed the hypothesis of this study.
